RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The gameEsc menu GameState.

This class provides the ingame menu GameState. It is called when you hit the Esc key when you're in game.

It uses a Irrlicht GUI tab widget to provide the show and hide functions.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::cleanup (  )  [virtual]

The destructor of the game state.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::createGui (  ) 

Create the menu.

It uses a Irrlicht gui tab (not a tab control) sized as the entireIrrlicht viewport, draw a centered window and add some buttons.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::init (  )  [virtual]

The constructor of the gsGame game state.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::pause (  )  [virtual]

The pause method.

It simply hides the tab containing the menu.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::resume (  )  [virtual]

The resum method.

We can call this method after a call to pause(). It makes the tab containing the menu and the mouse cursor visible.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameEsc::run (  )  [virtual]

The method called by GameEngine for each frame.

It simply call the draw methods for the Irrlicht scene manager and Irrlicht gui environment.
